format: A data frame with 280 observations on the following 3 variables.

parameters.corp:
a factor, corp of Prussian Army generating
observation
parameters.year: a numeric vector, 18XX, year of observation
parameters.y: a numeric vector, count of deaths

title: Prussian army horse kick data
description:
Description
Deaths by year, by corp, from horse kicks.
reference: von Bortkiewicz, L. 1898. Das Gesetz der Kleinen Zahlen. Leipzig: Teubner.
